title: The Novel: early Victorian England and Charles Dickens
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and John Barnes
brief_description: Examines Victorian England, pointing out its startling contrasts of morality and hypocrisy, splendour and squalor, prosperity and poverty. Illustrates these points by enactments of episodes from Dickens’ novels.
title_for_label: The Novel: early Victorian England and Charles Dickens
